name: UnminableVehiclesForEveryone
title: Uncle Shred's unminable vehicles for everyone!
author: Choumiko/LegionMammal978
description:
Makes vehicles unminable or teleports players to spawn after mining/rotating a vehicle.
Teleported players can't move until they are killed.
Only real admins can stop this.
Forked from Choumiko's original Uncle Shred's unminable vehicles mod, but this time with less executive corruption.
